Pre-Game Insights: The match is the first competitive meeting between France and Italy in 16 years.
France has a deep talent pool despite injuries, while Italy is rebuilding with a focus on consistency.
Didier Deschamps has maintained most of his Euro 2024 squad but made several changes due to injuries and form.
Luciano Spalletti's Italy are using a 3-5-2 formation with key players like Mateo Retegui and Giacomo Raspadori.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is part of Group 2 of the Nations League, with the top two teams qualifying for the finals.
France and Italy both have strong historical rivalries and recent performances to consider.
